description: Synthetic policy describing reasons for domain suspension and reactivation steps.

sections.title: Suspension Reasons
sections.text: Domains may be suspended due to missing WHOIS information, unresolved abuse complaints, or policy violations.

sections.title: Reactivation Requirements
sections.text: To reactivate a suspended domain, users must update their WHOIS data and resolve any outstanding compliance issues.

sections.title: Notification Policy
sections.text: Notification emails are typically sent 48 hours prior to suspension unless severe abuse is detected.
